title: Installation issue: intel-mpi or intel-mkl due to "Please select at least one component before you continue."
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install intel-mpi@2019.3.199 %intel@19.0.3
...
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    './install.sh' '--silent' 'silent.cfg'
See build log for details:
  /lustre/kcaps/var/spack/stage/intel-mpi-2019.3.199-xyc6caebqvl75qysn5jckzuvrk3a62ss/spack-build.out
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux 3.10.0-514.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Nov 22 16:42:41 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.3.1611 (Core)
``` 

### Additional information

```
$ cat ==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> [2019-04-26-16:47:27.694083] './install.sh' '--silent' 'silent.cfg'
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please select at least one component before you continue.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

$ cat /lustre/kcaps/var/spack/stage/intel-mpi-2019.3.199-xyc6caebqvl75qysn5jckzuvrk3a62ss/l_mpi_2019.3.199/silent.cfg
ACCEPT_EULA=accept
ARCH_SELECTED=INTEL64
COMPONENTS=ALL
CONTINUE_WITH_INSTALLDIR_OVERWRITE=yes
CONTINUE_WITH_OPTIONAL_ERROR=yes
PSET_INSTALL_DIR=/lustre/opt/sandybridge/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.0.3/intel-mpi-2019.3.199-xyc6caebqvl75qysn5jckzuvrk3a62ss
PSET_MODE=install
SIGNING_ENABLED=no

$ ./install.sh --list_components
intel-icc__x86_64, version: 19.0.3
intel-icc-32bit__x86_64, version: 19.0.3
intel-ifort__x86_64, version: 19.0.3
intel-ifort-32bit__x86_64, version: 19.0.3
intel-mkl-core-c-32bit__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-core-c__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-cluster-c__noarch, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-tbb-32bit__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-tbb__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-pgi-c__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-gnu-c-32bit__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-gnu-c__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-core-f-32bit__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-core-f__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-cluster-f__noarch, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-gnu-f__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-gnu-f-32bit__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-f95-32bit__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mkl-f__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-tbb-devel-32bit__x86_64, version: 2019.4
intel-tbb-devel__x86_64, version: 2019.4
intel-imb__x86_64, version: 2019.3
intel-mpi-sdk__x86_64, version: 2019.3
```
